messages.content:
तुमच्या दिलेल्या चित्रात पानांवर काही नुकसान दिसत आहे, जे किड्यांच्या क्रियाकलापामुळे होऊ शकते, जसे की छिद्र आणि असमानता. हे किडे जसे की "लीफ माइनर्स" किंवा "कॅटरपिलर्स" असण्याची शक्यता आहे.

तुमच्या पिकाचे प्रकार "तरबूज" आहे आणि ते सध्या "विकासात्मक अवस्थेत" आहे. किड्यांच्या उपस्थितीवर लक्ष ठेवण्याची शिफारस केली जाते. 

किड्यांच्या नियंत्रणासाठी काही सामान्य उपाययोजना:
1. **नियमित निरीक्षण**: पिकांचे वारंवार निरीक्षण करा.
2. **शारीरिक अडथळे**: तरुण पिकांचे संरक्षण करण्यासाठी जाळी किंवा रांगेचे कव्हर वापरा.
3. **नैसर्गिक शत्रू**: किड्यांवर शिकार करणाऱ्या उपयुक्त कीटकांना प्रोत्साहन द्या.

जर नुकसान वाढले, तर कृपया प्रभावित क्षेत्रांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करून स्पष्ट चित्र प्रदान करा, जेणेकरून अधिक अचूक मूल्यांकन केले जाऊ शकेल.
messages.en:
Your given picture shows some damage on the leaves, which may be caused by insect activity, such as holes and inequalities. These insects are likely to be such as "leaf miners" or "caterpillars."

Your crop type is "watermelon" and is currently in a "developmental stage." Monitoring the presence of insects is recommended. 

Some common measures for pest control:
1. **Regular inspection**: Observe crops frequently.
2. **Physical barriers**: Use netting or row covers to protect young crops.
3. **Natural enemies**: Encourage useful insects that prey on insects.

If damage increases, please provide a clearer picture by focusing on the affected areas, so that a more accurate assessment can be made.

messages.content:
तुमच्या दिलेल्या दुसऱ्या चित्रात पानांवर काही किड्यांच्या हल्ल्याचे लक्षणे दिसत आहेत, विशेषतः "आफिड्स" किंवा इतर रस चोरणाऱ्या किड्यांमुळे होणारे नुकसान. पानांच्या रंगात बदल आणि टेक्सचरमध्ये बदल यामुळे हे स्पष्ट होते.

तुमच्या पिकाचे प्रकार "तरबूज" आहे आणि ते सध्या "विकासात्मक अवस्थेत" आहे. किड्यांच्या उपस्थितीवर लक्ष ठेवण्याची शिफारस केली जाते.

किड्यांच्या नियंत्रणासाठी काही सामान्य उपाययोजना:
1. **नियमित निरीक्षण**: पिकांचे वारंवार निरीक्षण करा.
2. **कीटकनाशक वापरा**: जर किडे निश्चित झाले, तर कीटकनाशक साबण किंवा नीम तेल वापरा.
3. **वाऱ्याची वर्तुळ**: योग्य वाऱ्याची वर्तुळ सुनिश्चित करण्यासाठी पिकांचे योग्य अंतर ठेवा.

जर समस्या कायम राहिली, तर प्रभावित क्षेत्रांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करून स्पष्ट चित्र प्रदान करा, जेणेकरून अधिक अचूक मूल्यांकन केले जाऊ शकेल.
messages.en:
Your second picture shows signs of some insect attack on the leaves, especially damage caused by insects that steal "aphids" or other juices. This is evident from changes in leaf color and texture.

Your crop type is "watermelon" and is currently in a "developmental stage." Monitoring the presence of insects is recommended.

Some common measures for pest control:
1. **Regular inspection**: Observe crops frequently.
2. **Use pesticides**: If pests are fixed, use pesticide soap or neem oil.
3. **Wind circle**: Keep proper distance of crops to ensure proper wind circle.

If the problem persists, provide a clearer picture by focusing on the affected areas, so that a more accurate assessment can be made.

messages.content:
तुमच्या अपलोड केलेल्या छायाचित्रात दाखवलेले द्राक्षांचे गुच्छ निरोगी आणि चांगले दिसत आहेत. तथापि, अधिक अचूक विश्लेषणासाठी, मला कोणत्याही संभाव्य रोग किंवा कीड यांची तपासणी करणे आवश्यक आहे.

छायाचित्र स्पष्ट नसल्यामुळे, कृपया द्राक्षांच्या गुच्छांचा जवळचा शॉट द्या, विशेषतः कोणत्याही चिंतेच्या क्षेत्रांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करताना. चांगल्या छायाचित्रांमध्ये चांगली प्रकाशयोजना आणि स्पष्टता असावी, ज्यामुळे रंग बदल, डाग किंवा असामान्य वाढ यासारख्या लक्षणांना हायलाईट करता येईल.

तुमच्याकडे पिकाबद्दल कोणती विशिष्ट चिंता आहे का?
messages.en:
The grape clusters shown in your uploaded photo look healthy and good. However, for a more accurate analysis, I need to examine any potential diseases or pests.

Since the picture is not clear, please give a close shot of the grape clusters, especially when focusing on any areas of concern. Good photos should have good lighting and clarity, which can highlight symptoms such as color changes, spots, or abnormal growths.

Do you have any specific concerns about the crop?

messages.content:
मातीचा pH स्तर मोजण्यासाठी तुम्ही खालील पद्धतींचा अवलंब करू शकता:

1. **मातीची चाचणी**: स्थानिक कृषी कार्यालय किंवा प्रयोगशाळेत मातीची चाचणी करा. ते तुम्हाला pH स्तर आणि इतर पोषण तत्वांची माहिती देतील.

2. **pH मिटर वापरा**: बाजारात उपलब्ध pH मिटर वापरून तुम्ही थेट मातीचा pH मोजू शकता. यासाठी तुम्हाला मातीचा नमुना पाण्यात मिसळून मिटरमध्ये घालावा लागेल.

3. **कृषी सल्लागाराची मदत**: तुमच्या क्षेत्रातील कृषी सल्लागार किंवा तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा. ते तुम्हाला योग्य पद्धती आणि साधने सुचवू शकतात.

4. **संपूर्ण क्षेत्रातील नमुने**: विविध ठिकाणांहून मातीचे नमुने गोळा करा, कारण pH स्तर क्षेत्रानुसार बदलू शकतो.

pH स्तर 6.0 ते 7.5 दरम्यान असणे सामान्यतः चांगले मानले जाते. जर pH कमी किंवा जास्त असेल, तर तुम्हाला सुधारणा करण्यासाठी योग्य उपाययोजना करावी लागेल.
messages.en:
You can adopt the following methods to measure the pH level of the soil:

1. **Soil testing**: Test the soil at a local agricultural office or laboratory. They will inform you about pH levels and other nutrients.

2. Use **pH meter**: You can directly measure the pH of the soil using the pH meter available in the market. For this, you have to mix the soil sample with water and add it to the meter.

3. **Help from an agricultural consultant**: Contact an agricultural consultant or expert in your field. They can suggest you the right methods and tools.

4. **Samples from the entire area**: Collect soil samples from different locations, as pH levels can vary by region.

Having a pH level between 6.0 and 7.5 is generally considered good. If the pH is low or high, you have to take appropriate measures to improve.

तुम्ही याचा वापर करून मातीचा pH स्तर मोजू शकता.

मी मातीचा pH मोजण्याबद्दल एक व्हिडिओ ट्यूटोरियल तयार केला आहे. तुम्ही खालील लिंकवर क्लिक करून तो पाहू शकता:

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉट्ससाठी योग्य मातीची आर्द्रता (kPa) खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

1. **Manikchaman plot no.1**:
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 5 (ओलसर) - 32 (कोरडी)
   - कोरडी कपा वरील आर्द्रतेवर पाणी द्यावे.

2. **Super plot New**:
   - मातीची आर्द्रता: 5 (ओलसर) - 25 (कोरडी)
   - कोरडी कपा वरील आर्द्रतेवर पाणी द्यावे.

जर तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
The appropriate soil moisture (kPa) for your plots is as follows:

1. **Manikchaman plot no.1**:
   - Soil moisture: 5 (moist) - 32 (dry)
   - Water on the moisture on the dry cup.

2. **Super plot New**:
   Soil moisture: 5 (moist) - 25 (dry)
   - Water on the moisture on the dry cup.

If you need any more information, please let me know.

messages.content:
**Main Palot Plot:**
- **Current Soil Moisture:** 
  - Sensor 1: 3 kPa (wet)
  - Sensor 2: 6 kPa (wet)
- **Optimal Soil Moisture Range:** 2 kPa (wet) - 20 kPa (dry)
- **Recommendation:** No need to irrigate right now as the soil is still wet.

---

**Sagha Valo Plot:**
- **Current Soil Moisture:** 
  - Sensor 1: 13 kPa (wet)
  - Sensor 2: 5 kPa (wet)
- **Optimal Soil Moisture Range:** 2 kPa (wet) - 18 kPa (dry)
- **Recommendation:** You can consider irrigating soon, especially if the moisture levels rise above the optimal range.

If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: અત્યારે બટાકામાં કયા ખાતર ની જરૂર છે
messages.en: What fertilizer is needed in potatoes right now
messages.standalone_question: What type of fertilizer is needed for the potatoes right now?
messages.standalone_en: What type of fertilizer is needed for the potatoes right now?
messages.content_transliterated: atyare batakaman kaya khatar knee jarur che

messages.content:
**Main Palot Plot (Tuber Development - Week 3):**
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.
  - **Day 4:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.

---

**Sagha Valo Plot (Tuber Development - Week 2):**
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.
  - **Day 4:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Potassium Nitrate: 1.5 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Use micro-nutrient fertilizers in foliar spray at a concentration not exceeding 1%.

---

Make sure to follow the schedule for optimal growth of your potato crop. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
messages.en:
**Main Palot Plot (Tuber Development - Week 3):**
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.
  - **Day 4:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.

---

**Sagha Valo Plot (Tuber Development - Week 2):**
- **Fertigation Schedule:**
  - **Day 1:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
      - Sulfate of Potash: 7 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.
  - **Day 4:** 
    - **Fertilizers:**
      - Potassium Nitrate: 1.5 kg/acre
    - **Note:** Use micro-nutrient fertilizers in foliar spray at a concentration not exceeding 1%.

---

Make sure to follow the schedule for optimal growth of your potato crop. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट चे काय उपयोग आहेत
messages.en: What are the uses of calcium nitrate?
messages.standalone_question: What are the uses of calcium nitrate?
messages.standalone_en: What are the uses of calcium nitrate?
messages.content_transliterated: calcium nitrate che kay upayog ahet

messages.content:
कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट (Ca(NO3)2) हे एक महत्त्वाचे खते आहे, ज्याचे उपयोग खालीलप्रमाणे आहेत:

1. **पोषण**: कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट पिकांना कॅल्शियम आणि नायट्रोजन प्रदान करते, जे त्यांच्या वाढीसाठी आवश्यक आहे.

2. **मातीची आरोग्य**: कॅल्शियम मातीच्या संरचनेत सुधारणा करतो, ज्यामुळे जलधारण क्षमता वाढते आणि मातीची गुणवत्ता सुधारते.

3. **फळांची गुणवत्ता**: कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट वापरल्याने फळांची गुणवत्ता आणि आकार सुधारतो, तसेच फळांच्या सडण्याची शक्यता कमी होते.

4. **पाण्याची कमी**: हे खते पाण्याच्या कमी परिस्थितीतही प्रभावी आहे, कारण ते जलद विरघळते आणि पिकांना जलद पोषण देते.

5. **पिकांच्या रोगांपासून संरक्षण**: कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट वापरल्याने काही रोगांपासून संरक्षण मिळवता येते, विशेषतः ज्या रोगांमध्ये कॅल्शियमची कमतरता असते.

6. **फोलिअर स्प्रे**: कॅल्शियम नायट्रेटचा फोलिअर स्प्रे म्हणून वापर केला जातो, ज्यामुळे पानांद्वारे पोषण मिळवता येते.

हे खते विविध पिकांसाठी उपयुक्त आहे, विशेषतः भाज्या, फळे आणि गहू यांसारख्या पिकांसाठी.
messages.en:
Calcium nitrate (Ca(NO3)2 is an important fertilizer, with its uses as follows:

1. **Nutrition**: Calcium nitrate provides calcium and nitrogen to crops, which are essential for their growth.

2. **Soil health**: Calcium improves soil structure, which increases water holding capacity and improves soil quality.

3. **Fruit quality**: Using calcium nitrate improves the quality and shape of fruits, as well as reduces the chances of fruit rot.

4. **Water scarcity**: This fertilizer is effective even in low water conditions, as it dissolves faster and nourishes crops faster.

5. **Protection from crop diseases**: Using calcium nitrate can provide protection against some diseases, especially those diseases that are deficient in calcium.

6. **Foliar Spray**: Calcium nitrate is used as foliar spray, which can provide nutrition through leaves.

This fertilizer is useful for a variety of crops, especially crops such as vegetables, fruits, and wheat.

messages.content: કેટલા સમયમાં આજે દવા છાંટવી
messages.en: How long to spray the medicine today
messages.standalone_question: How long should I wait to take the medicine today?
messages.standalone_en: How long should I wait to take the medicine today?

messages.content:
આજે, 11 જાન્યુઆરી 2025, તમે દવા છાંટવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય છે. આ માટેની દવા અને માત્રા નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph** - 2 ગ્રામ
2. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 મિલી

અથવા

1. **Metiram 44% + Dimethomorph 9%** - 2.5 ગ્રામ
2. **Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC** - 0.4 મિલી

અથવા

1. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 ગ્રામ
2. **Isocycloseram 9.2% w/w DC + Isocycloseram 10% w/v DC** - 0.4 મિલી

આ દવાઓ છાંટવા માટે 1 લિટર પાણીમાં ભેળવીને છાંટવું.
messages.en:
Today, January 11, 2025, is the right time for you to spray the drug. The medication and dosage for this are as follows:

1. **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph** - 2 grams
2. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 ml

or

1. **Metiram 44% + Dimethomorph 9%** - 2.5 g
2. **Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC** - 0.4 ml

or

1. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 grams
2. **Isocycloseram 9.2% w/w DC + Isocycloseram 10% w/v DC** - 0.4 ml

To spray these medicines, mix it in 1 liter of water and sprinkle it.

messages.content: घड फुगण्यासाठी कोणते खत द्यावे
messages.en: What fertilizer should be given to inflate the pitcher
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should be used to inflate a balloon?
messages.standalone_en: What fertilizer should be used to inflate a balloon?

messages.content:
आपल्या अंगूराच्या प्लॉटमध्ये सध्या "ब्रेक बड" (Break Bud) स्टेज आहे, जी 11 जानेवारी 2025 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. सध्या कोणतेही खत देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही.

तथापि, पुढील "कैन थिनिंग" (Cane thinning) स्टेजसाठी, 8 फेब्रुवारी 2025 पासून खालील खतांचा वापर करावा लागेल:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **जिंक ऑक्साइड**: 200 ग्रॅम/एकर

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
1. **मोनो पोटॅशियम फॉस्फेट**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर (इतर खतांच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे लागू करावे)
   
2. किंवा
   - **0-60-20**: 7 किलोग्राम/एकर

3. किंवा
   - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%**: 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश**: 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

कृपया या सूचनांचे पालन करा आणि योग्य वेळेत खतांचा वापर करा.
messages.en:
There is currently a "Break Bud" stage in your grape plot, which started on January 11, 2025. Currently, there is no need to provide any fertilizer.

However, for the following "cane thinning" stage, the following fertilizers will have to be used from February 8, 2025:

### In a Folier manner:
- **Zinc oxide**: 200 g/acre

### In a fertigation manner:
1. **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 kg/acre (apply for 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)
   
2. Or
   - **0-60-20**: 7 kg/acre

3. Or
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 5.5 kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

Please follow these instructions and use fertilizers in due course.

messages.content: બટાકાને સુપોષક તત્વ આપવા જરૂરી છે
messages.en: Potatoes need to be given a sucellular element
messages.standalone_question: Is it necessary to provide nutrients to potatoes?
messages.standalone_en: Is it necessary to provide nutrients to potatoes?
messages.content_transliterated: batakane suposhak tatv apava jaruri che

messages.content:
તમારા બટાકાના પાકને સુપોષક તત્વો આપવા માટેની સૂચનાઓ નીચે આપેલ છે:

### Dela Valu (Tuber Development - Week 2)
1. **Foliar Method (Day 1)**:
   - **Zinc Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
   - **Ferrous Sulphate**: 600 gm/acre
   - **Manganese Sulphate**: 400 gm/acre
   - **Note**: Foliar spray concentration should not exceed 1% (e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).

2. **Fertigation Method (Day 1)**:
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre
   - **Note**: Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.

3. **Fertigation Method (Day 4)**:
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre

### Patsala (Tuber Development - Week 2)
1. **Foliar Method (Day 1)**:
   - Same as Dela Valu.

2. **Fertigation Method (Day 1)**:
   - Same as Dela Valu.

3. **Fertigation Method (Day 4)**:
   - Same as Dela Valu.

### Upcoming Schedule
- **Week 3**: 
   - Foliar and fertigation methods will continue with specific fertilizers.

Ensure to follow these guidelines for optimal growth and yield of your potato crop. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: બટાકાને કયા પોષક તત્વો ની જરૂર છે
messages.en: What nutrients potatoes need
messages.standalone_question: What nutrients do potatoes need?
messages.standalone_en: What nutrients do potatoes need?
messages.content_transliterated: batakane kaya poshak tatvo knee jarur che

messages.content:
બટાકાને મુખ્યત્વે નીચેના પોષક તત્વોની જરૂર છે:

1. **નાઇટ્રોજન (N)**: પાન અને કંદના વિકાસ માટે જરૂરી છે. તે છોડની વૃદ્ધિ અને પાનના રંગને સુધારે છે.

2. **ફોસ્ફરસ (P)**: મૂળોના વિકાસ અને ફૂલો અને ફળોના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. તે ઊર્જા પરિવહન અને સેલ ડિવિઝનમાં સહાય કરે છે.

3. **પોટેશિયમ (K)**: પાણીની જાળવણી, રોગપ્રતિકારકતા અને કંદના ગુણવત્તા માટે જરૂરી છે. તે છોડની તાકાત અને મજબૂતીમાં વધારો કરે છે.

4. **કેલ્શિયમ (Ca)**: કોષ્ટકની મજબૂતી અને મૂળોના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

5. **મેગ્નેશિયમ (Mg)**: ક્લોરોફિલના ઉત્પાદન માટે જરૂરી છે, જે પ્રકાશ સંશ્લેષણમાં મદદ કરે છે.

6. **સલ્ફર (S)**: પ્રોટીન અને અમિનોએસિડના ઉત્પાદન માટે જરૂરી છે.

7. **માઇક્રોન્યુટ્રિયન્ટ્સ**: જેમ કે ઝિંક, બોરોન, મંગનીઝ, અને આયર્ન, જે નાના માત્રામાં પણ મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

આ પોષક તત્વોનું સંતુલિત પ્રમાણ બટાકાના પાકની ગુણવત્તા અને ઉપજને સુધારવા માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. ખાતર અને ફર્ટિગેશન દ્વારા આ પોષક તત્વો પૂરા પાડવા માટે યોગ્ય યોજના બનાવવી જરૂરી છે.
messages.en:
Potatoes mainly need the following nutrients:

1. **Nitrogen (N)**: Essential for the growth of leaves and tubers. It improves the growth of the plant and the color of the leaves.

2. **Phosphorus (P)**: Is important for the development of roots and the development of flowers and fruits. It helps in energy transport and cell division.

3. **Potassium (K)**: Essential for water retention, immunogenicity and quality of tubers. It increases the strength and strength of the plant.

4. **Calcium (Ca)**: Important for the strength of the table and the development of roots.

5. **Magnesium (Mg)**: Essential for the production of chlorophyll, which helps in photosynthesis.

6. **Sulphur (S)**: Required for the production of proteins and aminoacids.

7. **Micronutrients**: such as zinc, boron, manganese, and iron, which are important even in small quantities.

A balanced amount of these nutrients is important for improving the quality and yield of potato crops. It is necessary to make a proper plan to provide these nutrients through fertilizer and fertigation.

messages.content: બટાકાને હવે આવતીકાલે શું પોષક તત્વ આપવા
messages.en: What nutrients to give potatoes tomorrow
messages.standalone_question: What nutrients should be given to potatoes tomorrow?
messages.standalone_en: What nutrients should be given to potatoes tomorrow?
messages.content_transliterated: batakane have avatikale shu poshak tatv apava

messages.content:
આવતીકાલે (12 જાન્યુઆરી 2025) તમારા બટાકાના પાક માટેની પોષક તત્વોની સૂચનાઓ નીચે આપેલ છે:

### Dela Valu (Tuber Development - Week 2)
1. **Foliar Method**:
   - **Zinc Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
   - **Ferrous Sulphate**: 600 gm/acre
   - **Manganese Sulphate**: 400 gm/acre
   - **Note**: Foliar spray concentration should not exceed 1% (e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).

2. **Fertigation Method**:
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre
   - **Note**: Apply Calcium Nitrate separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers.

### Patsala (Tuber Development - Week 2)
1. **Foliar Method**:
   - Same as Dela Valu.

2. **Fertigation Method**:
   - Same as Dela Valu.

### Summary
- **Foliar Spray**: Apply micro-nutrient fertilizers as mentioned.
- **Fertigation**: Apply Calcium Nitrate and Sulfate of Potash.

આ સૂચનાઓનું પાલન કરીને, તમે તમારા બટાકાના પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ગુણવત્તા સુધારી શકો છો. જો તમને વધુ મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો પૂછવા માટે સ્વતંત્ર રહો!

### Summary

- **Fertigation**: Apply Calcium Nitrate and Sulfate of Potash.

આ સૂચનાઓનું પાલન કરીને, તમે તમારા બટાકાના પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ગુણવત્તા સુધારી શકો છો. જો તમને વધુ મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો પૂછવા માટે સ્વતંત્ર રહો!

messages.standalone_en: What medicine should be sprinkled inside the potatoes today?
messages.content_transliterated: bataka knee andar kai dava chantavani che aje

messages.content:
આજે બટાકા માટે છાંટવાની દવાઓ:

1. **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph** - 2 ગ્રામ
2. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 મિલી

અથવા

1. **Metiram 44% + Dimethomorph 9%** - 2.5 ગ્રામ
2. **Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC** - 0.4 મિલી

અથવા

1. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 ગ્રામ
2. **Isocycloseram 9.2% w/w DC + Isocycloseram 10% w/v DC** - 0.4 મિલી

**ઉપયોગનો ઉદ્દેશ:** લેટ બ્લાઇટ, ઈરલી બ્લાઇટ, આફિડ્સ, વ્હાઇટફ્લાય, પાન ખાવા વાળા કીટક, અને માઇટ્સ સામે રક્ષણ. 

**અરજીનો રીત:** ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે.
messages.en:
Spraying medicines for potatoes today:

1. **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph** - 2 grams
2. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 ml

or

1. **Metiram 44% + Dimethomorph 9%** - 2.5 g
2. **Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC** - 0.4 ml

or

1. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 grams
2. **Isocycloseram 9.2% w/w DC + Isocycloseram 10% w/v DC** - 0.4 ml

**Purpose of use:** Protection against late blight, erly blight, aphids, whitefly, leaf-eating insects, and mites. 

**Method of application:** Foliar spray.

messages.content: બટાકામાં દવાનો છંટકાવ કયા ટાઈમે કરો
messages.en: At what time do you spray the medicine in potatoes?
messages.standalone_question: What time should I apply pesticides to potatoes?
messages.standalone_en: What time should I apply pesticides to potatoes?
messages.content_transliterated: batakaman davano chantakav kaya time karo

messages.content: આજે બટાકા માટે કોઈ દવા છંટકાવની શેડ્યૂલ નથી. જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો કૃપા કરીને પૂછો.
messages.en: There is no medicine spraying schedule for potatoes today. Please ask if you would like more information.
